data.text: @sunrickbell I think they already dipped into the green line fund. There has to be a good reason it only stops at 16th ave instead of far into the far north as originally planned. #yyccc needs a change.

@sunrickbell @seanchucalgary NOW is the time for All of Calgary’s Elected Officials to “Put Forward and Unanimously Support a Motion to Immediately End to this INSANITY”- Tonights Council Meeting is the Forum. Do they have the Balls to Do the Right Thing?? #yyc #yyccc #enough #enditnow
@sunrickbell #yyccc  Could this circus get anymore embarrassing?  Pull the plug, and let’s work towards fixing the financial mess this City, Province and Country have become.
@sunrickbell Time to cut and run. Get back to running this complicated city and stop this bankrupt goose chase.

@sunrickbell @SoniaKont The Olympic bidding process has lost all credibility. Time to pull the plug, and stop wasting more money on this nonsense. The city is broke, the province is broke, the country is broke. We don't need the Olympics, we need a pipeline, or two, or perhaps even three.
@The_JPR @sunrickbell Good one. Now let’s figure out how to find a voters list! Sanitation ..... your up!
@sunrickbell @seanchucalgary We'll all be able to hear the blood pressure rising in City Hall when they read this column.

@sunrickbell I’m thinking it’s time for a corporate, personal phone and computer check on who the leakers are letting all this info out on Friday, 😉. Would love to hear all the excuses pile up. The bid is in #2026. Did #YYCCC think we were paying in ‘88 bucks or what?

@The_JPR @sunrickbell I’m thinking the context is that if we “classify” green line $ “as if” they were intended as Olympic inspired 😉😉 projects the feds would up their share as “matching” therefore no money needed by #YYC just Feds. *I Think* reading through the double speak.
@sunrickbell My view of Calgary's Olympic Bid #OhTheHumanity https://t.co/dfLBunnsUe

@sunrickbell If this is true, #yyc needs to take note - “In no uncertain terms they tell the city politicians to zip their lips with the press.”
As info, since 88, more than 6 cities have bid over the last 8 Winter Olympics. We’re at 3 (ish) and dropping like flies. Why? #yyccc #NoCalgary2026
@sunrickbell The suspense is melting the snow
